content: Read these guidelines carefully to ensure a smooth raiding experience. Indicate that you have read, understood, and agree to be held accountable to them using the provided reaction.

embeds.title: Compulsion Heroic/AOTC Team Standards
embeds.description: __â€œWe don't just pull bosses. We build victories.â€__

fields.name: ğŸ”¥ Why Structure Matters
fields.value: Heroic isn't just Normal with bigger numbers. Every fight demands coordination, preparation, and accountability. One unenchanted weapon or missed interrupt can wipe the team.

fields.name: ğŸ§  Respect Everyone's Time
fields.value: Prepared = Empowered. Be ready with the approprate gear, gems, enchants, and consumables. Showing up ready means respecting the time and effort of your team.

fields.name: ğŸ”„ Consistency = Progress
fields.value: Random rosters stall momentum. We iterate, improve, and assign roles based on a stable team. Progression thrives on consistencyâ€”not chaos.

fields.name: ğŸ§© Officer-Proof Systems
fields.value: Clear qualifications. No drama. Consistent participation, minimum ilvl, log improvements, and prep checklists make it easy to know who's ready. Officers shouldn't have to guess or debate - and neither should the players.

fields.name: ğŸ† AOTC Is a Brand
fields.value: Compulsion stands for clarity, excellence, and pride. AOTC teams reflect our identityâ€”branded visuals, clear expectations, and a shared sense of achievement.
